actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: To require Members of Congress to disclose delinquent tax liabilities and wage garnishments, and for other purposes.
short_title: Members of Congress Tax Liability and Garnishment Accountability Act of 2020
subjects: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

summary.text:
Members of Congress Tax Liability and Garnishment Accountability Act of 2020

This bill requires Members of Congress to disclose any delinquent tax liability or garnishment of their wages, and it establishes mechanisms for a Member to pay what is owed on a delinquent tax liability.

titles.title: Members of Congress Tax Liability and Garnishment Accountability Act of 2020
